attributes.action: Change the 2 year period of continuous work to have the right to make a claim.
attributes.additional_details: Because in many many situations the dismissal reasons are poor, but the companies know their rights much better than a lot of people (especially emigrants). I don’t think is fair to be dismissed just because of racism, because the managers are expecting you to be a puppy, because any colleague doesn’t like you and he is complaining about you and the management never investigate, they just dismiss people without understanding the situation and so on.
